overview_of_class: Basis for advanced courses in fluid dynamics. Stress, flow kinematics, rate of strain, material derivatives, and general balance equations. Navier-Stokes equations and exact solutions.
name: Fundamentals of Fluid Dynamics
title: MEAS MECH_ENG 425-0-1 Fundamentals of Fluid Dynamics
